content.raw:
we spoke about this yesterday and my impression is that we want to add Acropolis to the list of buildcop jobs. I’m working on adding the acropolis view to the DSL code so we can generate the views from there reusing the code. Please leave this open until I finish the changes.

The other shor term option is to modify our bash script to include both views.
content.html:
we spoke about this yesterday and my impression is that we want to add Acropolis to the list of buildcop jobs. I’m working on adding the acropolis view to the DSL code so we can generate the views from there reusing the code. Please leave this open until I finish the changes.

The other shor term option is to modify our bash script to include both views.
